titles.title: Urging the Government of Taiwan to grant former President Chen Shui-bian medical parole to ensure that he receives the highest level of medical attention.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Urges the government of Taiwan to grant former President Chen Shui-bian medical parole to ensure that he receives the highest level of medical attention.
